projects.title: Backtracking Sudoku Solver
projects.description: This using recursive backtracking to solve any Sudoku board. It is slightly modified in order to draw progress every frame.
projects.name: sudoku

projects.title: Maze Generator
projects.description: Creates a maze from a grid of cells using stack data structures and random choice. Inspired by Dan Shiffman.
projects.name: maze

projects.title: Times Tables
projects.description: Connection between the Mandelbrot Set and times tables. Inspired by Mathologer on YouTube.
projects.name: t-tables

projects.title: Purple Rain
projects.description: I made this for my wife when she was out of town. It says 'i miss you' over some purple rain.
projects.name: purple-rain

projects.title: Circle Intersections
projects.description: Intersections between horizontal and vertical circles at different rates.
projects.name: intersections

projects.title: Fountain
projects.description: Just a random small project I made to replicate the physics of water fountains.
projects.name: fountain

projects.title: Hair
projects.description: Particles following a vector field. Turns out that looks like hair.
projects.name: hair
